sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-form ref="form" class="login-form">
      <v-text-field
        v-model="email"
        :rules="[(v) => !!v || 'Email is required']"
        label="Email"
        required
        class="email-field"
      ></v-text-field>

      <v-text-field
        v-model="password"
        :rules="[(v) => !!v || 'Password is required']"
        label="Password"
        required
        type="password"
        class="password-field"
      ></v-text-field>

      <v-btn @click="submit" color="primary">Login</v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      email: '',
      password: ''
    }
  },
  methods: {
    submit () {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        // Form is valid, proceed with login logic
        console.log('Form is valid')
        // Here you can add your login logic
      } else {
        console.log('Form is not valid')
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.login-form {
  width: 300px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

.email-field,
.password-field {
  margin-bottom: 16px; /* Add some space between the fields */
  background-color: #000; /* Set the background color to black */
  color: #fff; /* Set the text color to white for better visibility */
  border: 1px solid #ccc; /* Add a border for visibility */
}
</style>
